. federal public defender scott wendelsdorf said during a conference call with prosecutors and a judge that former 101st airborne soldier Steven Green will rely on medical experts' evaluation of his medical condition in fighting the charges against him. my whole defense is going to be not guilty by reason of insanity, wendelsdorf said. Steven Green , of midland, texas, faces a possible death sentence if convicted on 16 charges that include premeditated murder and aggravated sexual assault in 2006. he pleaded not guilty in november 2006.
